name: Preschool Program
description: Classrooms are filled with learning opportunities to enhance children’s cognitive and language skills. Basic academics through small-group activities that encourage investigation, exploration, and discovery.

whatTheyOffer: Classrooms are filled with learning opportunities to enhance children’s cognitive and language skills. Basic academics through small-group activities that encourage investigation, exploration, and discovery.
howToGetIt: Schedule a tour using ONLINE CALENDAR or call (415) 504-6513.
